name: Cycle Stand Chainstay 500
madefor: We have designed this kickstand for parking a bike weighing no more than 25 kg (including luggage).
advantages:
advantage: adjustable
 ,reason: The height can be adjusted without the need for tools.
Where does it fix to your bike?: The 500 chainstay stand fixes to your bike's chainstay (screws included).
Which kind of bike is it for?: Because there are so many different types of bike, frame shapes and bottom bracket heights, please seek advice from our sales assistants.
What decathlon bikes is this compatible: Compatible with Rockrider ST30, ST40, ST100, ST120, ST540, XC series | Riverside 500 | Triban RC100, RC120 and above
